data.name: Lucario & Melmetal-GX
rules: TAG TEAM rule: When your TAG TEAM is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 3 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Steel Fist
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Metal Energy card and attach it to this Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Full Metal Wall-GX
attacks.text: For the rest of this game, your Metal Pokémon take 30 less damage from your opponent's attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance). If this Pokémon has at least 1 extra Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), discard all Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

data.name: Melmetal

abilities.name: Metal Eater
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a Metal Pokémon from your hand. If you do, heal 100 damage from this Pokémon.

data.flavorText: Revered long ago for its capacity to create iron from nothing, for some reason it has come back to life after 3,000 years.

data.name: Melmetal

attacks.name: Energy Link
attacks.text: Attach an Energy card from your discard pile to this Pokémon.

data.flavorText: At the end of its life-span, Melmetal will rust and fall apart. The small shards left behind will eventually be reborn as Meltan.

data.name: Melmetal-GX
rules: Pokémon-GX rule: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Hard Coat
abilities.text: This Pokémon takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Metal Blast
attacks.text: This attack does 20 more damage times the amount of Metal Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Iron Force-GX
attacks.text: Attach any number of Metal Energy cards from your discard pile to this Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

data.name: Melmetal

attacks.name: Ingot Swing
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from Pokémon that have an Ability.

attacks.name: Blasting Hammer
attacks.text: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon.

data.flavorText: Revered long ago for its capacity to create iron from nothing, for some reason it has come back to life after 3,000 years.

data.name: Melmetal

attacks.name: Swinging Smash
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 90 more damage for each heads.

data.name: Melmetal V
rules: V rule: When your Pokémon V is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Arm Charge
attacks.text: You may attach a Metal Energy card from your hand to this Pokémon.

data.name: Melmetal VMAX
rules: VMAX rule: When your Pokémon VMAX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 3 Prize cards.

attacks.name: G-Max Juggernaut
attacks.text: This attack does 60 more damage for each extra Metal Energy attached to this Pokémon (in addition to this attack's cost). You can't add more than 120 damage in this way.
